title: [Skin Concept] Retro Carnival / Big Top Circus Collection (Katarina, Shaco)
body:
http://i.imgur.com/iP0W9D5.jpg

So here are my first two concepts I drew up this morning with some free time - one for Katarina, and the other for Shaco, respectively. I have several others that I thought of doing, but I figured I should see how these first few are received before I invest more time and energy into really going all out on this.

The two you see here:

- The Amazing Katarina (knife thrower)
- The Amazing Shaco (knife thrower)

Other ideas:

- The Amazing Braum (strongman with massive, weight-like shield with a decorated cannon in the middle)
- The Amazing Sejuani (beast tamer - maybe a lion with a cat-o-nine-tails whip)
- The Amazing Draven (juggler)
- The Amazing Brand (fire breather)
- Big Top Tahm Kench (ring leader)
- High Striker Poppy (hammer game with the bell)
- Soothsayer Ahri (fortune teller)


If I decide to keep going with this, I will be streaming my process on my Twitch channel: www.twitch.tv/monolithyk

Any feedback helps!

replies.body: Ok - I'm going to make a few more of these over the next few days!
the flying talon?  trapeze artist?  dress him up like the flying graysons?
lol I think needs to happen
We need the amazing warwick. It's only natural. A wolf that can leap long distances? that sounds like circus material right there.
If I can find a way to communicate this to visually match the style to WW's narrative, I might add it to the roster, who knows. . . Freak show or something?
It could work with that. Just think that ww could use a new skin idea and htis could fit well.
